= How to build macsim =

Currently, MacSim support only SCons build process.
Note that we will keep automake process only for the macsim-sst build. 

== Requirement ==

 # scons
  * ubuntu
{{{
apt-get install scons
}}}

== Build Steps ==

{{{
./build.py
}}}

 * build options
   * -j (--thread) : specify number of threads for parallel build
   * -d : debug build (-g)
   * -p : gprof build (-pg)
   * -c : clean
   * --dramsim : using DRAMSim2
